{{dcl|since=c++23|num=2|
constexpr bool has_value() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether {{c|*this}} represents an expected value.

===Return value===
{{box|{{rlpi|/#Data members|has_val}}}}

===Notes===
A {{rlpt|/|std::expected}} object is never valueless. If {{tt|has_value()}} returns {{c|true}}, {{rlpf|operator*}} can be used to access the expected value; otherwise, {{rlpf|error}} can be used to access the unexpected value.
